Primary treatment consist cardiovascular risk management improvement functional capacity supervise exercise therapy ( SET ) . A potential additional therapy administration fish oil supplement contain high amount omega-3 Poly Unsaturated Fatty Acids ( PUFAs ) . In earlier clinical experimental trial omega-3 PUFA 's improved hemorheological parameter erythrocyte deformability aggregation , number cardiovascular risk factor . Hemorheological parameter determine blood flow microcirculation , main importance patient IC since macrocirculation compromise . Inflammation consider important etiologic factor pathogenesis atherosclerosis contribute peripheral arterial disease Since omega-3 PUFAs also strong anti-inflammatory effect , might effective patient IC lower inflammatory response . In addition , visceral fat rather obesity general recognise etiologic prognostic factor atherosclerosis . We hypothesise administration omega-3 PUFA 's patient IC synergistic effect SET improve walk distance SET , improve hemorheological parameter result good microcirculation . Second , hypothesise omega-3 PUFA 's result le proinflammatory whole blood response ex vivo stimulation endotoxin . Third , hypothesise omega-3 PUFA 's SET result decrease visceral fat mass .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Fish Oil Supplements During Supervised Exercise Therapy Patients With Intermittent Claudication
